channel.title: Nevermind

item.title: Nevermind
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

I added :

public int firstClan = 0; public int secondClan = 0;

And

} else if (token.equals("character-firstClan")) { firstClan = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-secondClan")) { secondClan = Integer.parseInt(token2);

And

characterfile.write("character-firstClan = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(firstClan), 0, Integer.toString(firstClan).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-secondClan = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(secondClan), 0, Integer.toString(secondClan).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Now my characters wonâ€™t save. When they log out the character is restarted.
